verses.name: Numbers 14:37
verses.text: Even those men that did bring up the evil report upon the land, died by the plague before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 14:38
verses.text: But Joshua the son of Nun, and Caleb the son of Jephunneh, which were of the men that went to search the land, lived still.

verses.name: Numbers 14:39
verses.text: And Moses told these sayings unto all the children of Israel: and the people mourned greatly.

verses.name: Numbers 14:40
verses.text: And they rose up early in the morning, and gat them up into the top of the mountain, saying, Lo, we be here, and will go up unto the place which the Lord hath promised: for we have sinned.
